infos.name: ActiveCampaign Newsletter
infos.description:
Suchst du eine funktionierende ActiveCampaign-Integration?

Such nicht weiter! Mit dutzenden Installationen aus unseren Erfahrungen mit echten Projekten haben wir eine Lösung geschaffen, die es unseren Kunden erlaubt, sich auf das wesentliche zu fokussieren.

Die ActiveCampaign-Integration wird regelmäßig aktualisiert und du profitierst direkt aus der täglichen Erfahrung mit unseren Kundenprojekten. Hier bekommst du nicht eine Erweiterung, die einmal entwickelt und nie mehr wieder supportet wird! 


Warum Erweiterungen von der Mothership?

Wir sind nicht nur zertifizierte Shopware-Entwickler, sondern auch Open-Source Enthusiasten. Mit über 15 Jahren Erfahrung im Bereich digitaler Geschäftsprozesse und individueller Softwareentwicklung verfügen wir über alle Kenntnisse, um die Anforderungen unsere Kunden bestmöglich umzusetzen.  Wir veranstalten regelmäßig den Shopware-Stammtisch in München und sind für unseren exzellenten Support und Know-how bekannt.

Und natürlich: We ❤️ Shopware.


Installation

Die App benötigt einen aktiven ActiveCampaign Account. Sobald du Zugriff auf den Account hast, kannst du die ActiveCampaign Url sowie API Schlüssel in deinem ActiveCampaign Konto unter Einstellungen / Entwickler / API-Zugriff finden.

Die Installation erfolgt via App Store. Nachdem du die App installiert hast, füge bitte die ActiveCampaign Url sowie API Schlüssel im Shopware Backend in den Einstellungen der App ein (siehe Screenshots). Warte 10-15min und die ersten Newsletter Abonnenten sollten in ActiveCampaign erscheinen.

Nutzungshinweise

Nach der Installation werden automatisch die Newsletter Abonennten zu ActiveCampaign importiert. Zusätzlich reichern wir die Daten an, indem wir die Abonennten durch Kunden- und Adressinformationen sowie Bestelldaten anreichern. Grundsätzlich speichern wir diese Abonennten in einer ActiveCampaign-Liste. Die Informationen aus dem Shop-System werden mit zusätzlichen Attributen hinterlegt.

Datenschutz liegt uns am Herzen: Wir speichern keine Kundeninformationen. Die Kundeninformationen vom Shop werden von einem Server im deutschen Rechenzentrum direkt zu ActiveCampaign importiert und nach Verarbeitung gelöscht.

Noch Fragen?

Für mehr Informationen zur Funktionsweise besuche unsere Website oder kontaktiere uns via support [AT] mothership.de

infos.name: ActiveCampaign Newsletter Integration
infos.description:
Supercharge Your Shopware Store with Seamless ActiveCampaign Integration!

Are you looking to take your Shopware (cloud) store to the next level? Look no further! Our cutting-edge app brings the power of ActiveCampaign directly to your fingertips, enabling you to focus on your marketing efforts.


Why you should trust us?

We are not only certified Shopware developers, but also open source enthusiasts. With over 15 years of experience in the field of digital business processes and individual software development, we have all the knowledge to implement the requirements of our customers in the best possible way.  We regularly host the Shopware-Meetup in Munich and are known for our excellent support and know-how. And last bot not least: We ❤️ Shopware!


Still questions?

For more information on how it works, visit our website or contact us via support [AT] mothership.de.
infos.installationManual:
Installation

The app requires an active ActiveCampaign account. Once you have access to the account, you can find the ActiveCampaign URL and API key in your ActiveCampaign  account under Settings / Developers / API Access.

The installation is done via the App Store. After you have installed the app, please add the ActiveCampaign URL and API key in the Shopware backend in the app settings (see screenshots). Wait 10-15 minutes and the first newsletter subscribers should appear in ActiveCampaign.

Use instructions

After the installation, the newsletter subscribers are automatically imported to ActiveCampaign. Additionally, we enrich the data by adding customer and address information as well as order data to the subscribers. Basically, we store these subscribers in an ActiveCampaign list. The information from the shop system is stored with additional attributes.

Data protection is close to our heart: we do not store any customer information. The customer information from the shop is imported directly to ActiveCampaign from a server in the German data centre and deleted after processing.


Quick-Start


  • Install the app via the app store
  • Enter your ActiveCampaign API Url and API Key in the app settings.
  • Wait a few minutes until the app connects to ActiveCampaign and transfers existing newsletter subscriptions to ActiveCampaign.
  • If your newsletter subscriptions are not transferred, don't hesitate to contact us and we will check the interface immediately.

Data protection is important to us: customer data is deleted after processing.
Top support: We usually reply within a few business days.

changelog.text:
Bug-Fix
  • Compatibility issue with "One Page Checkout" plugin solved

With this major release we provide new functionalities. Details can be found at https://www.mothership.de/leistungen/shopware-apps/shopware-activecampaign. To ensure that the functions run without problems, please make sure that the app has been updated correctly in the shop under "Extensions" before you activate the functions in the administration.

Transmission of orders

ActiveCampaign offers an e-commerce interface to store customers and orders independently of newsletter contacts. A direct integration is already available for the shop systems Shopify, Magento and WooCommerce. We are now making this feature available to Shopware users and creating the possibility to transfer customers and orders to ActiveCampaign. Provided your ActiveCampaign plan has DeepData support, the e-commerce feature can be enabled in the Shopware settings. This activates a tracking script in your shop and all new orders are sent to ActiveCampaign, provided the customer has accepted marketing cookies. Customer information, products of the order and the order itself are transmitted.

Tracking shopping cart abandonments

ActiveCampaign already offers from the "Plus" option for Shopify, Magento and WooCommerce the possibility to track abandoned shopping carts. This feature is now integrated into the app since version 1.3.0. To activate it, go to the e-commerce section in the app settings. To activate the tracking script, "E-Commerce" must also be active. You can also select a time period from which a shopping cart is marked as cancelled.

Display the state of the transfer in the shop transparently

Whether a contact has been transferred to ActiveCampaign can now be checked in the app settings. Log information with minimal information is generated within the app, this information is shared with your shop. To do this, go to the "Logs" tab and select a log file.

Contact data enrichment through mappings

Currently, Shopware newsletter subscribers are transferred to ActiveCampaign contacts. In addition, the shop sends events, e.g. when a customer or order has been saved. Through the new configuration in the Shopware administration, we now offer assignments to save or enrich any fields from the customer account or order in the respective contact for these events. This information can be used in ActiveCampaign to segment contacts and send newsletters to self-defined groups.

ActiveCampaign's website tracking can be enabled in the store to add basic tracking.

  • New configuration "ActiveCampaign Tracking" in the app settings in Shopware Administration.
  • Privacy: site tracking is integrated with the default Shopware cookie banner. Only when customers agree to it, the script is activated.
  • The account number can be found in ActiveCampaign under Websites/Website Tracking

First release

  • Shop registration
  • Newsletter recipient transfer (first name, last name, email, status) as soon as ActiveCampaign access data has been stored
  • Customer/address transfer (first name, last name, email, status
